div.p: Distance learning will begin on Monday, March 30, 2020. For more information click here or visit the COVID-19 Updates Page.
the COVID-19 District Updates page for more information.

04/13/2020 Meal distribution days have changed to limit contact between staff and parents. Beginning this week meals will be distributed on Mondays and Thursdays only. Those 0-18 years of age may pick up their meals at no cost from noon to 1:00 in the parking area north of the HS gymnasium. Those qualifying must be present to be served. Call 940-726-3659 ext.131
Questions about this service may be directed to jkassen@vvisd.net.
Due to new TEA rules, the 5th six weeks will be extended until the end of the school year. Click here for more details.
Campus office hours during the closure are 8 am - 1 pm.
Click here to view a letter from Mr. Stokes regarding senior activities.
